description: Replace each 1 in decimal expansion of n with 1 1's, each 2 with 2 2's, etc. (0 vanishes).
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) A048376(n)={sum(i=1,#n=concat( apply( t->vector(t,i,t),digits(n) )),n[i]*10^(#n-i))} \\ - _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 23 2013
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Mar 15 1999.
